english.segment1: Heard you knocking at my door. And although I should have answered. I ignored. But you kept a louder call. And in time you would have. Broken down my walls
english.segment2: So I give in to you. I give in to you. I know it's gonna hurt but I concede. I believe in you. I agree with you. And I'm holding on to you for all I need
english.segment3: All the sin inside of me. Caused a wound inside my soul. And still it bleeds. But I ignored the remedy. Even though I know you hold . The antidote for my disease
english.segment4: So I give in to you. I give in to you. I know it's gonna hurt but I concede. I believe in you. I agree with you. And I'm holding on to you for all I need
english.segment5: With your hands upon me. And your path before me. It's gonna be alright
english.segment6: I give in to you. I give in to you. I know it's gonna hurt but I concede. I believe in you. I agree with you. And I'm holding on to you for all I need
